title: What Does MK Stand for in a Text or DM?

steps.content: Add an exclamation point or happy emoji to avoid sounding sarcastic. steps.title: In English slang and formal writing, MK can stand for many different things.
steps.content: In English slang and formal writing, MK can stand for many different things. While youâ€™re most likely to see â€œmkâ€ meaning â€œokayâ€ in most texts or DMs, it might mean something else based on the context of the conversation. Take a look at these other possible (but less commonly used) meanings: [2] X Research source Mortal Kombat (the video game) Mary Kay (the cosmetics company) Markup (the cost difference between retail and wholesale prices) Magic Kingdom (the Disney World amusement park) Mong Kok (a major shopping area in Hong Kong) Michael Kors (the designer)
